          <title>
            <string language="en">Charging a metal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufladung eines Metalls</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remplissage d'un métal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carregando um metal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caricare un metallo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρέωση ενός μετάλλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carga de un metal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figures illustrate the steps in charging a metal by method of induction using a van de Graff generator.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">discharge</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">van de Graff generator</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildungen veranschaulichen die Jobsteps, 
wenn sie ein Metall durch Methode der Induktion mit einem Packwagende 
Graff Generator aufladen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les figures illustrent les étapes en chargeant un
métal par méthode d'induction à l'aide d'un générateur de de 
Graff de fourgon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As figuras ilustram as etapas em carregar um 
metal pelo método da indução usando um gerador de de Graff da 
camionete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le figure illustrano i punti nel caricare un 
metallo con il metodo di induzione per mezzo di un generatore del de 
Graff del furgone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αριθμοί επεξηγούν τα βήματα στη χρέωση ενός 
μετάλλου με τη μέθοδο επαγωγής χρησιμοποιώντας μια γεννήτρια 
de Graff φορτηγών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las figuras ilustran los pasos de progresión en la
carga de un metal por el método de inducción usando un generador de 
de Graff de la furgoneta.</string>
          </description>
